prompt: make a irl for this image, keep the city and the night background, keep the form and the design of the mask

structured_prompt.short_description: A young man with dark skin and dreadlocks, wearing a dark blue hoodie, white t-shirt, and dark pants, is captured in a low squatting pose on a rooftop. He wears a stark white, expressionless mask with angry, angular eye slits. White wired earbuds are visible. The background features a sprawling city skyline at night, with numerous illuminated buildings under a dark blue sky, creating a moody and mysterious atmosphere.

objects.description: A young man with dark skin and short dreadlocks, wearing a dark blue zip-up hoodie over a white t-shirt and dark pants. He has white wired earbuds in his ears.
objects.relationship: The primary subject of the image, positioned against the city background.
objects.shape_and_color: Human figure, predominantly dark blue, white, and black.
objects.texture: Fabric of clothing appears soft, skin is smooth.
objects.appearance_details: His hands are resting on the ground in front of him, fingers slightly splayed. His posture is athletic and ready.
objects.pose: Low squat, leaning slightly forward, hands on the ground.
objects.clothing: Dark blue zip-up hoodie, white t-shirt, dark pants, dark sneakers.
objects.action: Squatting, appearing to be observing or preparing for action.
objects.orientation: Facing slightly to the right, body angled towards the viewer.

objects.description: A stark white, featureless mask covering the man's entire face. It has angular, angry-looking eye slits and a slightly downturned mouth shape, conveying a sense of menace or sadness.
objects.relationship: Worn by the man, obscuring his identity.
objects.shape_and_color: Oval shape, pure white with black eye slits.
objects.appearance_details: The eye slits are sharp and pointed, giving an intense, almost hostile expression.
objects.orientation: Facing slightly to the right, matching the man's head orientation.

lighting.direction: Primarily backlit by the city lights, with some ambient light illuminating the subject from the front/sides.
lighting.shadows: Soft, diffused shadows on the subject, with longer, subtle shadows cast by the man onto the ground due to the low light and city glow.

aesthetics.composition: Centered composition with the subject prominently in the foreground, creating a strong focal point against the detailed background. The squatting pose fills the lower half of the frame.

structured_prompt.context: This is a realistic photograph of a masked individual in an urban night setting, suitable for a character portrait in a film, game, or a dramatic editorial piece.
